patthana15.22:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found, as it’s amazing.
patthana15.22:1.1_0: for the sake of honor, not for the sake of respect, not for the sake of the teaching, for the sake of non-identification. ...
patthana15.22:1.1_1: Not for the sake of a cause, he doesn’t allow the reason for the sake of dwellings, the for the sake of medicines, and the benefit of the teaching.
patthana15.22:1.1_2: Passing on what is conducive to the three supports, there’s sorrow.
patthana15.22:2.1_0: Not seeing the cause of desire and ill will for the sake of confusion,
patthana15.22:2.1_1: ‘... for the sake of one day.’ ...
patthana15.22:3.1_0: Because of not seeing the cause or condition for the sake of health,
patthana15.22:3.1_1: Not seeing the cause or condition for the sake of health,
patthana15.22:3.1_2: Because of not seeing the cause or condition for the sake of non-acting teaching, not for the sake of seeing the causes and conditions.
